name: InfraCost
description: Real-time cloud infrastructure cost estimation and optimization tool for DevOps and FinOps teams manage cloud spending.
features: Real-time cost estimation for AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, and other major providers
Integration with infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.)
Cost breakdown by resource, service, and team
Custom budget management and spending controls

name: AppStack
description: Full-stack application scaffolding and management tool with built-in best practices and design patterns.
features: Project templates for multiple frameworks and stacks
Built-in linting and code quality tools

name: CloudDeploy
description: One-click deployment solution for containerized applications across multiple cloud providers.
features: Support for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud

name: StackGen Core
description: The official core framework for building and integrating all StackGen services and components.

name: CloudManager
description: Unified cloud resource management dashboard with multi-cloud support and advanced monitoring.
